item.title: Video Editor for Polished Video Creation With Davinci Resolve - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can take our raw video clips and transform them into polished videos. The ideal candidate will have experience in adding titles, transitions, background music, and voice-over words to create engaging and professional videos. This project requires meticulous attention to detail and the ability to bring creative ideas to life.  We are looking for someone that is an expert in Davinci Resolve.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit video clips to create seamless and visually appealing transitions
    - Add relevant titles and captions to enhance the storytelling
    - Incorporate background music and sound effects to enhance the overall quality
    - Implement voice-over words to provide context and clarity

    Required Skills:
    - Proficiency in video editing software Davinci Resolve
    - Strong sense of storytelling and visual aesthetics
    - Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver high-quality results

This is a medium-sized project that will require a commitment of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level video editor who has the skills and expertise to deliver outstanding videos that align with our brand. This project will be broken into several videos that will go on Youtube and Outdoor Chanel TV.

If you are passionate about video editing and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you. Please share your portfolio showcasing your previous video editing work along with your proposal.

item.title: Video Spokesperson - Greenscreen - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a video spokesperson to deliver a friendly and casual explainer video for a local financial institution.

We're looking for someone who can film and record themselves in front of a green screen.

Client is a bank. The topic will be to explain the lending process and related steps to loan applicants.

Script will be provided: there is approximately 1 minute 45 seconds of content.

The video spokesperson we hire must film themselves on a green screen and provide us the video files. We will edit and mix the video.

Multiple takes are expected.

Client will have perpetual rights to use the video on their website. The video will be available to consumers visiting the client's website as they research how to apply for a loan.

Video will not be used for paid promotion.

We're looking for a female spokesperson who is friendly and conversational.

We will define a basic outfit (for instance: business casual blazer with white shirt). We may send the talent a client-branded shirt (such as an embroidered polo).

item.title: Looking for Talented and Experienced Video Editor to Create Amazing Video for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced video editor to help us create a high quality and engaging final product from our well-crafted script and audio recording for our new YouTube channel.
This is a potential LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses based on quality work and the performance of the channel!  You’re responsible for creating high-quality and engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.

The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of storytelling and visual aesthetics, as well as flair and out-of-the box creativity, with the ability to bring our vision to life. Responsibilities include editing footage, adding visual effects, sound design, color correction, and ensuring smooth transitions. The final product should be polished and professional, ready for distribution on various platforms, but especially for YouTube.  Your main KPI would be directly measured against the High Retention performance of the video itself. Thus, a guaranteed commitment to read (not just skim) the entire script from the candidate is a MUST.  No lazy shortcuts!

Our niche is in BUSINESS STORIES / MANUFACTURING PROCESS, so the ideal candidate must have a knack for delivering a simple easy-to-understand, yet effective storytelling within the final video product in a chronological / orderly nature. The aim of our video is to always Edutain -- Educate and Entertain -- our audience. The ideal candidate must have the same mindset when crafting the finished product.

Required Skills:
- Proficient in professional video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong understanding of storytelling, seamless transitioning, and visual aesthetics
- Ability to work with written script and audio recordings in English
- Great knowledge of sound design, sound editing, and color correction
- Well-versed in understanding of Copyright and Fair Use law (non-negotiable)
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines (within 48 hours or less)
- Proficient is using AI tools for editing and creating special effect/animation is a huge plus
- Resourcefulness in creating and/or sourcing effective video footages that might not have been easily obtained elsewhere
- Willing to work and grow with the team
- Willingness to provide a custom-made free video sample of one minute or less, based on the given mock up script and recorded audio file. This free video editing sample won't be used for any future video production (out of respect for the candidate as well)
   
If you are passionate about video editing and have a portfolio showcasing your previous work,  especially within the niche required, we would love to hear from you! This is a great opportunity to collaborate with a creative team and create impactful content.
Looking forward to receiving your work!

Budget: $25
